content:
TreeViewDesigner Class

Definition

Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the TreeView control.

In this Article

public class TreeViewDesigner : System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HierarchicalDataBoundControlDesigner

Constructors

TreeViewDesigner()

Initializes a new instance of the TreeViewDesigner class.

public TreeViewDesigner ();

Properties

ActionLists

Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.

public override System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection ActionLists { get; }
Value
DesignerActionListCollection

The DesignerActionListCollection associated with this designer.

AutoFormats

Gets the collection of predefined automatic formatting schemes to display in the Auto Format dialog box for the associated control at design time.

public override System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection AutoFormats { get; }
Value
DesignerAutoFormatCollection

A DesignerAutoFormatCollection object that contains the predefined schemes for the control.

UsePreviewControl

Gets a value indicating whether the control designer uses a temporary preview control to generate the design-time HTML markup.

protected override bool UsePreviewControl { get; }
Value
Boolean

true, if the control designer uses a temporary copy of the control for design-time preview; otherwise, false, if the control designer uses the stem.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.Component* property for the control contained in the control designer.

Methods

CreateLineImages()

Displays a dialog box to edit the line images for the TreeView control.

protected void CreateLineImages ();

DataBind(BaseDataBoundControl)

Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.

protected override void DataBind (System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl);
dataBoundControl
BaseDataBoundControl

The data bound control.

EditBindings()

Displays a dialog box to edit the data bindings.

protected void EditBindings ();

EditNodes()

Displays a dialog box to edit the TreeNodeCollection object.

protected void EditNodes ();

GetDesignTimeHtml()

Retrieves the HTML markup that is used to represent the control at design time.

public override string GetDesignTimeHtml ();
Returns
String

The markup used to render the control at design time.

GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml()

Retrieves the HTML markup text that is used to render a placeholder for the associated control at design time.

protected override string GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml ();
Returns
String

The markup used to render the control at design time with an empty data source.

GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(Exception)

Provides the markup that is used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.

protected override string GetErrorDesignTimeHtml (Exception e);
e
Exception

The Exception that was thrown.

Returns
String

The markup used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.

GetSampleDataSource()

Constructs a sample data source that can be used at design time for the associated control.

protected override System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalEnumerable GetSampleDataSource ();
Returns
IHierarchicalEnumerable

An object implementing the IHierarchicalEnumerable interface that can be used as a data source for controls derived from HierarchicalDataBoundControl.

Initialize(IComponent)

When overridden in a derived class, provides for custom initialization of the given TreeView control.

public override void Initialize (System.ComponentModel.IComponent component);
component
IComponent

An IComponent that can be cast as a TreeView.
